Kenner.The Galleria (Metairie, Louisiana): The Galleria located at One Galleria Blvd in Metairie, Louisiana, is a 21-story, 269-foot (82 m)-tall skyscraper designed by architect HKS, Inc. The Galleria was completed in 1986 and is the second tallest building in Jefferson Parish. The tower's primary use is as office space.
